means: 视力好的，目光明亮的，头脑清晰的

sentence.Network_en: He was tall and straight and clear - eyed and browned.
sentence.Network_cn: 他个子高高的,身子笔挺,两眼清澈,皮肤晒得黑黑的.

sentence.Network_en: His greatest plays are all plays of powerful clear - eyed affirmation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的最伟大的剧作都鲜明而有力地肯定了某些东西.

sentence.Network_en: Our new chairman should have a clear - eyed vision of the organisation's future.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的新主席,应当对本机构的未来有一个具洞察力的愿景.

sentences.sentence: "too clear-eyed not to see what problems would follow"
"chaos could be prevented only by clear-sighted leadership"
"much too perspicacious to be taken in by so spurious an argument"
